title: Question is it punishable to report a player who them, and their duo partner pick a troll pick
body: Is it punishable to report a player or players for them and their duo partner or however mean other players pick a troll pick because they do not get the role they want. I have seen plenty of people get their champs banned that they were hovering, or people pick troll picks in attempts to get what their friend wants. And I mean in the sense of just locked it in didnt say a word. Not like explains the plan or anything.
